TopicTitle: More EVA KAS-like activities (the toolbox implementation)

Articles.Content:
Remember this thing?

![Ui30jSB.png](http://i.imgur.com/Ui30jSB.png)

Pepper Ridge Fa**ANYYYYYWAY** I thought I would like to see some more things to do when on Extravehicular Face-sliding Activities. Collecting data doesn't seem productive enough to me and some other people, so I decided to make a short list of things that should be movable/replaceable by Kerbals.

-Fuel pipes

-Replacing/welding science equipment, solar panels and other small parts.

-Placing/removing/connecting tethers

-Playing golf, throwing hammers and feathers at other crew members for science

-Connecting/disconnecting trusses

-Sample examing and gathering animations and statistical data as their result (suggested by sumghai)

-More (Suggest!)

In my opinion it would greatly help with space station assemblies and crisis situations, because when in danger and with limited supplies it is always good to tape stuff together and try going home.

As it is past 0:00 where I live and can't think of anything else I leave this thread to you to discuss and suggest more things that you think should be doable using the toolbox showed above.

Pardon me if this have already been suggested and feel free to merge/lock this thread if it is your will.
